name: Military Secret Commando
description:
Military Secret Commando is a fabolus sniper shooting game, this fight is between two military forces.One force attack on the other force. The enemies force have different backups for attack. Lot of enemy soliders that behind the hurdles and attack on them.You are special traind soldier of your army with different modern snipers finish all these enemies and clear this area

Military Secret Commando:Features

Realistic shooting effects
different types of rifles
Good graphics
Easy to play
